reviewText: Saw it on Netflix and loved it!
One of the best series I have watched. Dominic Purcell & Kent Wentworth are 2 of my favorites!

Excellent TV series.  One of my favorite of all time.  At every episode, you think "they got you, how are you going to get out of this?" and somehow the writers are able to pull it off.  Season 1 was my favorite of all time.
Great TV show, probably in the top 5 greatest TV shows ever!

Snart wasn't talking in his normal snaaaaarrrt voice and for some reason him and Micky Rory are related now, very confusing do not recommend if you love the legends. also Snart seems to be going by an alias in the episodes i watch before i gave up because he did not use the freeze gun once.
